metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14732 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
AdPlug 2.3.1 has multiple heap-based buffer overflows in Ca2mLoader::load() in a2m.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14732` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

adplug-utils - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
libadplug-2.3.3-0 - 2.3.3+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: adplug package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.3+dfsg-2').
